doc.after: Sport also known as sports is all forms of competitive physical activity which through casual or organized participation aim to use maintain or improve physical ability and provide entertainment to participants Hundreds of sports exist from those requiring only two participants through to those with hundreds of simultaneous participants either in teams or competing as individuals
